Hi everyone,
Getting ready to sell 5 kogatana but wanted to offer them to the 
list before they go to ebay.
Brief descriptions and prices are as follows
1) Large and signed Tamba No Kami Yoshimichi- not in polish $350
2) Signed Tashiro Gen Ichi Kanemoto- in polish $350
3) Smaller blade w/ longer tang signed Idzumi No Kami Kanesada not  
in polish $300
4) Smaller blade w/ mon and kao and signed Nagasone Kotetsu- in 
polish with very nice temper $350
5) Large with a bonji and ken carved on front- unsigned, in polish 
$250
Email me privately at kirk-becky@... for pics or more info.  I 
will consider selling all five at a discount.
Thanks for your time and sorry for the commercial.
Kirk
